full_summary:
**Title (English)**: Induced and Contact Current Meters/
**Title (French)**: Mesureurs de courant induit et de contact
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01010225

 Industry Canada invites bids for the supply of Induced and Contact Current Meters. This Request for Information (RFI) is a stepping stone towards inviting pre-qualified suppliers for a potential contract.

**Notice Details**:
- **Notice Type (English)**: Request for Information
- **Notice Type (French)**: Demande de renseignements
- **Publication Date**: October 17, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 18, 2022, at 2:00 PM

**Supply Requirements**:
- **Estimated Quantity**: 26 units
- **Duration of Contract**: From the contract award date to March 31, 2023
- **Delivery Time frame**: March 31, 2023

**Trade Agreements**:
- The solicitation falls within the scope of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- This trade agreement will impact the bid evaluation process

**Eligibility and Participation**:
- Suppliers must provide evidence of their experience and capability to deliver the quantity of goods within the specified timeframe
- Participation in the procurement process is open to all eligible suppliers

**Contact Details**:
- **Contact Person**: Leonard Irani, Industry Canada
  - Email: [leonard.irani@canada.ca](mailto:leonard.irani@canada.ca)
  - Phone: 613-447-7050

**Attachments**:
- [RFI Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/17/9d7f10975aeb68cbf17db66981df959a/rfi_on_induced_and_contact_current_meters_-_eng.pdf)
- [RFI Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/17/c8472bfcf7d2c2d36543bce0605be7f3/rfi_on_induced_and_contact_current_meters_-_fr.pdf)

Industry Canada encourages eligible suppliers to respond to this Request for Information to obtain further information about the supply requirements. The solicitation may be modified at any time according to the terms of trade agreements. The bidding process will be in
